Name: Cossack and Magic
About the game: Cossack and Magic is a game where you play in a fairy tale world. You are the commander of a detachment of Cossacks and you need to clear the forests and mountains from the hordes of fabulous creatures. The game is in the style of 'Tower Defense', but with an unusual performance. Create squads of warriors, upgrade the abilities of warriors, use rain magic, improve your health-destroy your enemies! The game has several game modes: Career and normal combat. Key features of the game: - The game develops strategic thinking! - Soundtrack; - Easy achievements.
